alert.note: Alert for Gloucester (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 2:16PM EST until further notice by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southern New Jersey, including the following counties, Cumberland, Gloucester and Salem. * WHEN...Until 745 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 215 PM EST, flooding is ongoing across portions of the warned area. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - For Cohansey River at Seeley: At 1:30pm the stage was 6.16 feet. Flood Stage is 6 feet. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
